ygData.subject: Re: Multiple installations of EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, this works fine. I have it at work and at home. The only things that don t move over with the server are: You Friends list and your hotkey assignments.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, this works fine. I have it at work and at home. The only things
that don't move over with the server are:
You Friends list and your hotkey assignments.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: HiFi Review [SMTP:hifireview@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 5:54 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Multiple installations of EQ
>
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> With the data all stored on the server I should be able to log into EQ
> form either of my computers, right? I don't mean to connect
> simultaneosly, but rtaher be bale to use either one at my discretion.
> has anyone installed on a second machine?
>
> Q d'E
